original_title: Yo Gabba Gabba!: It's Time to Dance
overview: It's Time to Dance! is the title of the premiere DVD from the hit show YO GABBA GABBA!(tm). The DVD includes four song filled episodes: “Friends,” “Eat,” “Dance,” and “Happy,” plus special features. YO GABBA GABBA! stars host DJ Lance Rock (Lance Robertson) who brings to life four friendly monsters and a robot in a colourful land of music and laughter.
title: Yo Gabba Gabba!: It's Time to Dance
